alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:58PM EDT until July 07 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Bamberg County in central South Carolina... East central Aiken County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 657 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Aiken State Park, or 19 miles northwest of Denmark, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Williston, Blackville, North, Springfield, Neeses, Norway, Elko, Woodford, Livingston and Edisto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
